column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2020
column14: I have bought Bath and Body Works Foaming Hand Soaps for years, and loved it as it lasts for a while.  Due to covid I opted to purchase the hand soap online, and came across this set which seemed like a reasonable deal.  When I received it I did not noticed any deference until we started to use it.  Normally one container lasts us approximately a month (give or take).  We just started to use one last week, and it is already half way through.  The foam is not as frothy as I am used to and at times it will just squirt out pure liquid.  At first I thought it was just one container that had a faulty pump, but this is happening to every single one of the soaps in this set.  If you are like me, and truly love this product, I would not recommend you getting this particular set. Or purchase it from this vendor.  Buy it directly from Bath and Body Works.
